kDesc

You never know when you will need more ammo. The Terminator Bullet Holster forms part of The Terminator character clothing set. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

On ne sait jamais combien de munitions vont être nécessaires. La ceinture de balles du Terminator est disponible dans le lot de vêtements du Terminator. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Man weiß nie, wann man mehr Munition benötigt. Das Munitionsholster gehört zum Kleidungsset für den Charakter Terminator. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. Non sai mai quando ti servono altre munizioni. Il porta-proiettili di Terminator è parte del set d'abbigliamento del personaggio Terminator.
